name: html-to-react
description: A lightweight library that converts raw HTML to a React DOM structure.

scripts.test: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.test-html-coverage: rm coverage.html; ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --require blanket -R html-cov > coverage.html; open coverage.html

author: Mike Nikles
